revision.text:
'''Temporary battles''' refers to special battles in Pokéclicker where the player faces a trainer or Pokémon once to unlock other areas. Once the player wins, these battles become inaccessible. ==Alola== *Note: Minimum attack is calculated without taking into consideration click attack or the Pokémon's type(s). You can see how much damage you do against a certain Pokémon by clicking on or scrolling over the "Pokémon attack" number below the battle screen. The [[Type Effectiveness]] page has more information on how type matchups are ruled in Pokéclicker. {| class="wikitable collapsible" style="text-align: center;" |- ! Requirement !! Location !! Trainer !! Min. Attack !! Pokémon !! HP !! Weakness |- | Have Rockium Z [[File:RockiumZ.png|25px]] badge || [[Towns & Cities#Alola|Aether Paradise]] || Ultra Wormhole || 4,409,850 || ??? [[File:Nihilego.png|25px]] || 264,590,972 || (x4) Ground
(x2) Steel, Water, Psychic |- | Have Darkinium Z [[File:DarkiniumZ.png|25px]] badge || [[Towns & Cities#Alola|Altar of the Sunne and Moone]] || Ultra Megalopolis || 4,710,032 || Necrozma (Ultra) [[File:Necrozma_(Ultra).png|25px]] || 282,601,920 || (x2) Bug, Ghost, Ice, Dragon, Dark, Fairy |- |}
